vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.6.3;
son of: Abinadab (H0041);
brother of: Eleazar (H0499H) and Uzzah (H5798A)
§ Ahio = "brotherly" or "fraternal"
1) son of Abinadab who sheltered the ark
2) a Benjamite
3) another Benjamite of Saul's ancestry
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Abinadab; (b)   hijo de Beriá; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希約 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "親如兄弟的" 或 "如結拜兄弟的"
1) 保存了約櫃的亞比拿達的一個兒子 (撒下 6:4; 代上 13:7)
2) 一位便雅憫人 (代上 8:14)
3) 另一位便雅憫人, 是掃羅的祖先 (旁系) (代上 9:37)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希约 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "亲如兄弟的" 或 "如结拜兄弟的"
1) 保存了约柜的亚比拿达的一个儿子 (撒下 6:4; 代上 13:7)
2) 一位便雅悯人 (代上 8:14)
3) 另一位便雅悯人, 是扫罗的祖先 (旁系) (代上 9:37)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.14;
son of: Beriah (H1283I);
brother of: Arad (H6166B), Shashak (H8349), Jeremoth (H3406I), Zebadiah (H2069), Eder (H5738), Michael (H4317L), Ishpah (H3472) and Joha (H3109)
§ Ahio = "brotherly" or "fraternal"
1) son of Abinadab who sheltered the ark
2) a Benjamite
3) another Benjamite of Saul's ancestry

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.31;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732)
§ Ahio = "brotherly" or "fraternal"
1) son of Abinadab who sheltered the ark
2) a Benjamite
3) another Benjamite of Saul's ancestry
